description: This table contains data about medication orders in external encounters that was received but could not be stored discretely.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record for this row.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name for the external order.

columns.name: FREQUENCY
columns.description: A description of the external order's frequency.

columns.name: LINK_GROUP_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: If the external order was part of a linked group, this contains a unique identifier for that group. This is not the ID of any other record in the system.

columns.name: LINK_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
If the external order was part of a linked group, this contains the link type of that group.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Followed by


Or


And
